contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Jayarajadevi.JPG|thumb|170px|Presumed portrait of '''Jayarajadevi''', in a representation of [[Tara (Buddhist)|Tara]], recognizable to the jina [[Amitabha]] in her coiffure, 12th century, [[Khmer empire]], [[Cambodia]].]] '''Jayarajadevi''' was the religious and influential wife of King [[Jayavarman VII]] of the [[Khmer Empire]].{{citation needed|date=April 2013}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://angkor1431.tripod.com/index/id19.html History of Jayavarman VII] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Jayarajadevi | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Cambodian queen | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} [[Category:Year of birth missing]] [[Category:Year of death missing]] [[Category:Cambodian queens]] [[Category:Cambodian Hindus]] {{Cambodia-royal-stub}}
